title: Rambukkana arsonist arrested by CID
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Criminal Investigations Department has arrested the suspect who set fire to the bowser in Rambukkana on 19th April.
The 28-year old suspect has been arrested in Rambukkana area, and is due to be presented before the Kegalle Magistrate Court today (23).
BASL requests for 21st amendment, abolition of Executive Presidency and interim Govt
